source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH x AS (
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY prs.[Krow__Project_Skill__c], 
                         prs.[Name], 
                         m.[MedewerkerKey], 
                         pr.[Name], 
                         rs.[Name], 
                         s.[SkillKey] 
            ORDER BY prs.CreatedDate DESC) AS RowNum,
        prs.[Krow__Project_Skill__c] AS SkillID,
        prs.[Name] AS ProjectResourceSkillName,
        prs.CreatedDate,
        prs.[Certification_Date__c] AS CertificationDate,
        pr.[Name] AS ProficiencyRatingName,
        rs.[Name] AS ResourceSkillName,
        m.[MedewerkerKey],
        s.[SkillKey]
    FROM 
        [s2_stg_salesforce].[ProjectResourceSkill] prs
    LEFT JOIN 
        [s2_stg_salesforce].[ProficiencyRating] pr
    ON 
        prs.[Krow__Proficiency_Rating__c] = pr.[Id] 
    LEFT JOIN 
        [s2_stg_salesforce].[ResourceSkills] rs
    ON 
        prs.[Krow__Project_Skill__c] = rs.[Id] 
    LEFT JOIN 
        s3_ods.DimMedewerkers m
    ON 
        prs.[Krow__Project_Resource__c] = m.[MedewerkerIdSF]
    LEFT JOIN 
        s3_ods.DimSkills s
    ON  
        prs.[Krow__Project_Skill__c] = s.[SkillId]
)
SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SkillID, ProjectResourceSkillName) AS MedewerkerSkillKey, 
    SkillID,
    ProjectResourceSkillName,
    CreatedDate,
    CertificationDate,
    ProficiencyRatingName,
    ResourceSkillName,
    MedewerkerKey,
    SkillKey
FROM 
    x
WHERE 
    RowNum = 1 
ORDER BY 
    SkillID, ProjectResourceSkillName;
